meanings.definition: The act of giving energy or power to something.
meanings.sent1: The energization of the battery revived the toy car.
meanings.sent2: The energization of the solar panels provided electricity to the house.
meanings.sent3: The energization of the sleepy robot made it dance around comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the energization of a dark room, instantly brightening everything.
meanings.sent5: The energization of the music filled the room with a lively beat.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming energized or activated.
meanings.sent1: The sudden energization of the machine startled the workers.
meanings.sent2: The energization of the athlete before the race was evident in their focused expression.
meanings.sent3: The energization of the sleepy cat resulted in a hilarious chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: His speech had an energization that captivated the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The energization of the city streets at night gave a vibrant and bustling atmosphere.
